9400.quoteText: Location Information: We collect approximate location of your computer or device you use to connect to our websites or Services based on the computer or device's IP address
9400.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

11472.quoteText: Pixel tags (or web beacons) are placed on our websites
11472.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11473.quoteText: You may opt out of receiving promotional emails from us by following the instructions in those emails.
11473.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

11474.quoteText: You have the right to access personal data we hold about you and to ask that this data be corrected. In certain cases, you may also have the right to request that we erase data we are processing or to restrict or object to certain of our processing activities.
11474.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

12332.quoteText: and emails, and allow us to track website usage and determine when emails have been opened and acted upon.
